content.rendered:
One system, one platform and one record for your care management.

Our system provides a single digital care ecosystem to manage every single operational need of care providers.

Learn more
Book a demo

We connect stakeholders to enable the best provision of care

One seamless platform to deliver game-changing efficiencies.

OneTouch is a single, multi-functional Care Management System which allows care providers to manage every aspect of their clients’ needs. Information is shared simply, and without loss or interruption, across all key stakeholders involved in an individual’s care delivery circle.

Don’t just take our word for it. Book a demo with one of our system experts today to see how OneTouch can help your reporting, rostering, digital care planning, finances, and HR processes and procedures today!

Book a demo

What makes OneTouch great?

Scheduling Features

Scheduling: it’s just easier with OneTouch

Build, edit and save schedules the way you want to. Our scheduling functionality makes planning and admin easier.
Find out more

Scheduling Features

Scheduling: it’s just easier with OneTouch

Build, edit and save schedules the way you want to. Our scheduling functionality makes planning and admin easier.
Find out more

Care Planning

Do it digitally!

Create bespoke templates for use across multiple services. Link to clinical interventions and medication management as required.
Find out more

Care Planning

Do it digitally!

Create bespoke templates for use across multiple services. Link to clinical interventions and medication management as required.
Find out more

Audits & Compliance

Empower your team. Showcase your strengths.

Simplify your CQC inspections and turn them into a showcase of the excellent work you and your team do every day.
Find out more

Audits & Compliance

Empower your team. Showcase your strengths.

Simplify your CQC inspections and turn them into a showcase of the excellent work you and your team do every day.
Find out more

Invoicing and Payroll

Simple, straightforward and speedy

If you build it, we’ll generate your payroll and invoices at the click of a button – timesheet based automated invoicing and payroll that needs to be seen to be believed.
Find out more

Invoicing and Payroll

Simple, straightforward and speedy

If you build it, we’ll generate your payroll and invoices at the click of a button – timesheet based automated invoicing and payroll that needs to be seen to be believed.
Find out more

Human Resources

We have every aspect of HR covered for you!

Manage your workforce from the same place you do everything else. OneTouch offers a huge range of HR functionality for your organisation.
Find out more

Human Resources

We have every aspect of HR covered for you!

Manage your workforce from the same place you do everything else. OneTouch offers a huge range of HR functionality for your organisation.
Find out more

Governance

Enhance control, create transparancy, build efficiency.

OneTouch takes the hassle out of governance empowering and streamlining the decision-making process within your care organisation.
Find out more

Governance

Enhance control, create transparancy, build efficiency.

OneTouch takes the hassle out of governance empowering and streamlining the decision-making process within your care organisation.
Find out more

See it in action

Sometimes seeing is believing – watch the video to see how we can help you to today.

Our simple to use, yet powerful system provides you with the tools to manage, plan and enhance the delivery of care and staff communications.

Book a demo
”

It was clear that OneTouch had the best product by far. They demonstrated that they were very easy people to deal with and that was important to us. When you are rolling out software of this scale, it’s a massive project for our business and it’s not just about the technology, it’s about the people you’re working with too. 

Sarah Leskinen-Keel, Chief Operating Officer AginCare
”

It’s changed the way that we work. Previously the homecare team would sign the prior week off on a Monday for the week before. Now, everything’s authorised on a daily basis. We have a lot of shifts to approve and the process goes entirely through OneTouch now which has proven easier and so much quicker. OneTouch has been very responsive in terms of any suggestions that we’ve made for alterations. To me, that’s really useful as I feel like they’re listening and developing the system.

Jo Boardman, Finance Director Alcedo Care
”

It really is a fantastic system; we would be lost without it. I don’t foresee us ever using another system because everything we need is right there! It has been a game changer for us, the system has our back, and we fully trust its capabilities.

Click here to read the full case study. 

Paula Maher, Founder and Managing Director Care at Home
”

We really like that the system provides a comprehensive view of both carers and clients. With the systems capability for immediate updates and managerial oversight, operations have become more efficient and accurate. This transition has minimised delays and enhanced the overall quality of care delivered to clients.

David Wallace, Director of Strategy and Operations Hibernia
”

It’s the hub. It’s at the centre of everything we do. We needed a robust, trusted partner and OneTouch Health is exactly that and we hope that partnership will be strengthened over the coming years. It’s revolutionary. Everyone has all the information, from photos of patients’ houses and directions on getting there to patient charts to rotas and calendars. The future for me is with OneTouch. 

David Haswell, Managing Director Bluebird NE

Our clients

We work with these amazing care organisations, partners and councils

At OneTouch we know that our system is only as good as the value our users get from it. That’s why when you sign-up with us we want to build a long-lasting partnership with you. Our users love us and we work hard to make sure OneTouch is the system that they can’t live without.

Our accreditations

OneTouch is a robust, secure and award winning digital care management system

Your data is the lifeblood of your business and we have achieved globally recognised standards to  demonstrating a commitment to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of your information. We pride ourselves on taking a relentlessly proactive approach to cybersecurity, in order to reduce your risk of data breaches and to help ensure your compliance with regulatory requirements. We’ve even won some awards (which we’re really proud of)!
